name: webhook-relay
description: Generic webhook relay to forward Sentinel events to custom endpoints with configurable event patterns and retry settings.
author: Sentinel Team

targetUrl.description: Target webhook URL to forward events to

customHeaders.description: Custom headers to include in forwarded requests (JSON object)

includeOriginalHeaders.description: Include original Sentinel headers (X-Sentinel-*) in forwarded requests

transformPayload.description: Wrap payload in envelope with metadata (event type, timestamp, organization)

maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts on failure

retryDelayMs.description: Base delay in milliseconds between retries (exponential backoff)

secretValue.description: Secret value to send in the authentication header
